title: Build journal entry UI with voice input
description: Create main journal entry form with textarea, voice recording, and conversation paste. See docs/implementation/01-foundation/04-journal-entry-ui.md

title: Implement MIRA user ID mapping
description: Create mapping between Firebase UIDs and MIRA user IDs. Store in Firestore collection.

title: Connect Stripe billing
description: Connect Stripe billing for Mora Plus/Pro. Implement checkout + billing portal + webhook to set users/{uid}.isPro and subscriptionTier. Tie upgrades to quota gating and premium outputs (best draft / deeper recall).

title: Create thread list and detail views
description: Build UI for auto-generated topic threads (replaces old People view)

title: Deploy MIRA-OSS service to Cloud Run
description:
Deploy MIRA-OSS as sidecar service on Cloud Run with PostgreSQL and Valkey.

DECISION (2026-01-10): Confirmed Option 1 - Sidecar Architecture. MIRA runs as separate Cloud Run service, Firebase Functions call it via bridge. Accepted risk of maintaining OSS fork. Self-hosting for data control.

See docs/implementation/01-foundation/01-mira-deployment.md and docs/decisions/001-mira-oss-integration.md for details.

title: Build Firebase-MIRA bridge function
description: Create analyzeEntry Cloud Function that bridges Firebase to MIRA-OSS. See docs/implementation/01-foundation/02-firebase-mira-bridge.md for implementation details.

title: Persist pattern bookmarks to Firestore
description: When users tap 'This applies to me' on a pattern, persist to user preferences in Firestore. These become seed data for MIRA personalization. Currently just logs to console.

title: Memory v0 UI: visible recall + correction
description: Add a visible 'Mora remembered' section on the analysis result screen. Show 3-7 recalled memories with short snippet + 'why this matters'. Add actions: Not relevant (hide + downrank) and Wrong (capture short correction). Must degrade gracefully if no memory. Depends on MIRA bridge (mora-r5o).
